pv.name: approxValue
pv.a:value: @2,500 Users = $2.5M at list price with appropriate volume discount. There may also be an opportunity for external users also.

pv.name: competitors
pv.a:value: Appian and Lombardi mentioned as potential solution SW. In addition, this RFQ calls for mobility and hooks to Acquisition Planning Wizard. No demo or orals are contemplated as part of the selection.

pv.name: opportunityOverview
pv.a:value:
BACKGROUND: The mission of GSA’s Public Buildings Service (PBS) is to provide a superior workplace for the federal worker and superior value to the American taxpayer. The vision is to be the best real estate organization in the world.
PBS is the landlord of the civilian federal government, with a total inventory of over 345 million square feet of workspace for a million federal employees in 2,000 American communities. This comprises over 1,600 government-owned buildings, or approximately 55 percent of GSA's total inventory. The remaining 45 percent is in privately owned leased facilities. eLease system: • eLease automates leasing processes and daily tasks of Realty Specialists by storing documents, providing electronic templates, utilizing a workflow engine, facilitating communication, and integrating with other systems

pv.name: partnerNames
pv.a:value: We have been approached by iTG and CGI to be subs to them. Both appear to be well positioned and have been pursuing this for over a year.

pv.name: winProposition
pv.a:value: GSA PBS looking to modernize their current eLease systems with a mobil-capable flexible BPM solution. Appian named in RFQ as potential solution along with Lombardi. Win proposition is a modern configurable born-mobile solution already in use and known by GSA.

a:interior-expressions.comment: ={"-no comments-", "Concerns about historical data. Need to discuss certain requirements with client to determine technology fit.", "Trying this for testing process.", "Too little information regarding the overall process and drivers to decision. Also, some requirements are far outside our scope.", "If cloud is an option, this would make a great social/mobile use case."}

form-element.label: Your Comments
form-element.instructions: Your decision will be posted on tempo and can be seen by the regional team and account executive who submitted this bid justification form.

form-element.label: Follow-on RFx?
form-element.instructions: For example, we previously responded to an RFI, and now the customer has issued an RFP.

form-element.instructions: Search for the opportunity name on Tempo to find related feed entries, and review discussions. Your decision will be posted to the regional team on Tempo, along with any comments you enter below.

form-element.instructions: If Appian is partnering with somebody, indicate whether or not Appian is the prime, and list the partner name(s) below.

form-element.label: Proposal Bid Justification Form
form-element.instructions: [FOR TESTING: Submit this form then refresh your tasks.] This form will be sent to the regional team to decide if Appian should respond to this RFx, and the final decision will be made by Edward Hughes.

form-element.label: Opportunity Overview
form-element.value:
BACKGROUND: The mission of GSA’s Public Buildings Service (PBS) is to provide a superior workplace for the federal worker and superior value to the American taxpayer. The vision is to be the best real estate organization in the world.
PBS is the landlord of the civilian federal government, with a total inventory of over 345 million square feet of workspace for a million federal employees in 2,000 American communities. This comprises over 1,600 government-owned buildings, or approximately 55 percent of GSA's total inventory. The remaining 45 percent is in privately owned leased facilities. eLease system: • eLease automates leasing processes and daily tasks of Realty Specialists by storing documents, providing electronic templates, utilizing a workflow engine, facilitating communication, and integrating with other systems
